name: Soul Stalker
description:
Soul Stalker is Vampire Survivors X Slay the Spire

A survivor roguelike where you banish the ghosts haunting the psyche of your town's residents. Create the ultimate build as you forge your own path in becoming a weapon of supernatural destruction.

Features

  • FORGE YOUR OWN PATH | Control fate by deciding what you encounter in a Slay the Spire-like map.
  • SYNERGISE | Build the ultimate loadout by choosing, merging, and upgrading weapons and trinkets.
  • PROGRESS | Unlock weapons, trinkets, and characters through a progression system that keeps playthroughs fresh and well-paced.
  • AUTOMATE | Decimate ghosts with automated attacks that reward good spacing and timing, just like Vampire Survivors and Brotato.
  • GRAPHICS | Savour the Paper Mario-inspired artstyle that mixes 2D and 3D.
  • MUSIC | Bless your eardrums with a soundtrack created by a composer versed in melodic RPG vibes.

You'll like Soul Stalker if you like

  • Vampire Survivors
  • Brotato
  • 20 Minutes Till Dawn
  • Spellbook Demonslayers
  • Bio Prototype
  • Peglin
  • The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth
  • Slay the Spire
  • Paper Mario
  • The Outbound Ghost
  • Bug Fables
  • Risk of Rain
  • Bounty of One
